item.title: Man accused of setting fire to 11 NYPD vehicles is arrested and charged with arson
item.description: A 21-year-old man has been charged with setting fire to 11 New York City police vehicles in Brooklyn during a time of nationwide protests in June

item.title: Critics say Trump tries to distract from Epstein by talking about everything but that
item.description: Critics say President Donald Trump is working to change the conversation from the Jeffrey Epstein files as the administration faces pushback for more ...

item.title: Bill Cosby speaks to ABC News about late co-star Malcolm-Jamal Warner
item.description: Bill Cosby shares intimate memories of Malcolm-Jamal Warner following "The Cosby Show" star's tragic drowning in Costa Rica.

item.title: WATCH: Sterling K. Brown talks 'Paradise' season 2
item.description: The actor revealed what's next for Agent Xavier Collins on the hit Hulu show.

item.title: WATCH: Caitlin Clark discusses fan reception during 2025 season
item.description: The Indiana Fever player told "GMA" what her fans mean to her during WNBA All-Star Weekend.
